original_title: The Last Sailors: The Final Days of Working Sail
overview: Neil Hollander sailed a ten-meter sailboat nearly 25,000 miles meeting and working alongside those men who still earned their livings using sailboats. This book recalls the authors' experiences with eight surviving craft, all representative of distinct cultures or geographic locations.
tagline: Three 52 minutes documentaries about the final days of working sail.
title: The Last Sailors: The Final Days of Working Sail
